misc/

vecrep.pro


top source vecrep

Misc

result = vecrep(vec, n)

Replicates a vector a given number of times.

Parameters

vec in

1D vector to replicate

n in

Number of times to replicate

Examples

IDL> a = [10,11,12] IDL> print, VECREP(a,2) 10 11 12 10 11 12
